systems.Description: Manage on-campus accommodation and external event bookings

systems.Key Capabilities: Attendance tracking; Engagement analytics; Early-warning alerts
Data aggregation; Predictive insights; Performance reporting

systems.Description: Manage digital content for web and portals
Provision and manage user identities and access rights across enterprise systems
systems.Key Capabilities: User provisioning; Authentication; Role-based access; Single sign-on

systems.Description: Support the submission,  management,  and tracking of research funding and contracts
systems.Key Capabilities: Grant application workflow; Compliance checks; Award management; Contract tracking

systems.Description: Collect and analyze student feedback on modules,  lecturers,  and teaching effectiveness
systems.Key Capabilities: Feedback surveys; Data analysis & reporting; Action tracking; Quality enhancement

systems.Description: Core SIS functionality to manage student data,  enrolment,  enrolment,  and awards
systems.Key Capabilities: Enrolment & registration; Academic records; Grades & progression; Graduation & award management

systems.Description: Create and manage academic timetables for classes,  rooms,  and other resources
systems.Key Capabilities: Schedule generation; Room allocation; Conflict resolution; Calendar integration

systems.Description: Deliver and manage online learning content,  assessments,  and collaboration tools
systems.Key Capabilities: Course content hosting; Online assessments; Discussion forums; Gradebook

systems.Description: Electronic identity verification service for student personal data and documents
systems.Key Capabilities: Document scanning; ID matching; Fraud detection; Verification status updates
systems.System of Record Data Entities: ID Verification Records, Student Identity Data

interactions.Description: Admissions system sends new student enrollments to SIS after acceptance
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Data duplication or missing fields from app forms
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Move to real-time API integration for immediate updates
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Applicant personal details, chosen program, admission status, name, department, course assignment info

interactions.Description: HR system provides staff and faculty records for SIS course assignments
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Inconsistent department codes between systems
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Implement data dictionary and automated data mapping
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Staff ID, name, department, course assignment info, student IDs, payment status, amounts

interactions.Description: Finance system sends daily fee payment reconciliation updates to SIS
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Overnight batch delay in updating student balances
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Transition to near real-time posting via web service
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Invoice IDs, student IDs, payment status, amounts, student account, amount paid, timestamp

interactions.Description: Payment gateway notifies SIS of completed tuition payments in real-time
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Payment confirmation lost if SIS endpoint is down
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Introduce message queue to buffer and retry transactions
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Transaction ID, student account, amount paid, timestamp, course ID, grade/marks

interactions.Description: Learning system pushes final course grades back to SIS for record keeping
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Grade data mismatches or failed transfers
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Adopt standardized grade schema and validation checks
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, course ID, grade/marks, class times, room numbers, instructor ID

interactions.Description: Timetabling software sends updated class schedules to SIS
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Scheduling changes not reflected promptly in SIS
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Implement event-driven updates for immediate schedule changes
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Course code, class times, room numbers, instructor ID, fine amount, hold flag

interactions.Description: Library system provides list of students with outstanding fines to SIS
interactions.Security Measures: SSH File Transfer; secured network path
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Delayed library hold updates affecting registration
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Integrate via API for instant hold clearing once fines paid
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, fine amount, hold flag, dorm/residence ID, room number, occupancy status

interactions.Description: Accommodation system updates SIS with on-campus housing assignments
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Different student ID references between systems
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Implement IAM integration for unified student IDs across systems
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, dorm/residence ID, room number, occupancy status, document type, receipt status, doc reference ID

interactions.Description: Document management system alerts SIS when required student documents are received
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Documents received but not flagged in SIS due to queue errors
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Add monitoring and retry logic for message processing
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, document type, receipt status, doc reference ID, visa type, expiration date, visa status

interactions.Description: International office system sends visa status updates for overseas students to SIS
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Lag in visa info could violate compliance if not updated
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Plan for real-time integration with government visa databases
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, visa type, expiration date, visa status, titles, credit values, prerequisites

interactions.Description: Curriculum management system pushes approved new course data to SIS
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Missing course attributes or mismatches in SIS fields
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Develop a unified curriculum repository or direct module in SIS
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Course codes, titles, credit values, prerequisites, milestone achieved, date of completion

interactions.Description: Research system notifies SIS of postgraduate research milestones achieved
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Research milestone updates may not sync if formats differ
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Switch to standardized API with JSON data format
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, milestone achieved, date of completion, email, phone, address changes

interactions.Description: CRM system pushes updated student contact info to SIS to keep records current
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Conflicting updates if students change data in multiple systems
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Enable bi-directional sync or single system of truth for profile updates
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, email, phone, address changes, risk score/alert type, timestamp

interactions.Description: Student engagement tool sends at-risk alerts to SIS for advisor visibility
interactions.Issues/Challenges: High volume of alerts could overwhelm SIS or be missed
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Incorporate filtering/thresholds and a dedicated alert handling service
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, risk score/alert type, timestamp, selected course IDs, semester, enrollment status

interactions.Description: External enrollment portal submits course registration selections into SIS
interactions.Security Measures: TLS encryption; SSO and JWT for student sessions
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Session timeouts or data loss during peak enrollment
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Scale system and use message queue to handle peak loads
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, selected course IDs, semester, enrollment status, course IDs, roles

interactions.Description: Enrollment and course info sent to VLE for student access
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Enrollment updates lag or mismatches in course data
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Adopt standard integration (LTI); real-time sync
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student enrollments, course IDs, roles, course registrations, class sections

interactions.Description: Course registration data provided to timetabling system for scheduling
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Schedule updates delayed until next batch
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Implement API for instant timetable updates
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student IDs, course registrations, class sections, amounts, due dates

interactions.Description: Tuition and fee charges transferred to Finance system for billing
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Reconciliation needed if transactions fail; processing delay
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Real-time billing updates via web service
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, charges, amounts, due dates, amount due

interactions.Description: Outstanding fees sent to payment gateway for online payments
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Payment updates not instant in SIS without feedback
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Use webhooks for immediate payment confirmation in SIS
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Invoice ID, student account, amount due, program, graduation date

interactions.Description: Graduate information provided to alumni CRM for outreach
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Data mapping differences (SIS vs CRM fields); duplicate records
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Event-driven updates on graduation; improved data mapping
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Contact details, program, graduation date, role, status

interactions.Description: New student accounts provisioned in IAM for IT access
interactions.Security Measures: TLS on message broker; token authentication
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Missed or duplicate messages can affect account creation
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Direct API integration with IAM or confirmation feedback
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Username, email, role, status, library ID

interactions.Description: Student status synced to library system for access privileges
interactions.Issues/Challenges: New students canât use library until next day if delayed
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Real-time API sync for immediate activation
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, enrollment status, library ID, financial records

interactions.Description: Academic records exported to data warehouse for BI reporting
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Reporting data is stale until next day; large ETL loads
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Real-time data streaming to DW or data lake
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Enrollment data, grades, financial records, personal data

interactions.Description: Student records and documents archived in EDRMS
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Large file transfers; ensure all records sent without error
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Automate batch for historical records; two-way verification
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Transcript PDFs, enrollment records, personal data, ID, enrollment status

interactions.Description: Student info shared with housing system for dorm allocation
interactions.Issues/Challenges: New students not visible to housing until sync runs
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: API for instant housing updates
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student name, ID, enrollment status, dorm preference, schedule info

interactions.Description: Class roster data sent to attendance tracking system
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Roster changes mid-term may be missed until next sync
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Real-time event push for adds/drops
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Course IDs, student IDs, schedule info, transcripts

interactions.Description: Exchange student data sent via EWP network to partner universities
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Interoperability issues with partner data formats; network reliability
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Include digital transcripts; extend to more partners
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student mobility data, learning agreements, transcripts, status (active/inactive)

interactions.Description: Notify facilities access system of student status for door access
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Missed notifications could leave student without access
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Add retry/confirmation for webhooks; integrate with IAM
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student ID, access permissions, status (active/inactive), project title

interactions.Description: Postgraduate student data sent to research info system for project tracking
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Complex data mapping; possible duplicate records
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Use standard researcher IDs (ORCID); increase sync frequency
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student researcher details, supervisor, project title, attendance flag

interactions.Description: Report international student enrollment to government visa system
interactions.Issues/Challenges: Strict compliance deadlines; errors can lead to legal issues
interactions.Future Improvements/Plans: Automate acknowledgments from govt system; real-time monitoring
interactions.Data Entities Flowing: Student visa info, enrollment status, attendance flag
